name: Low-C Drift
description:
The speed of light has dropped to 100MPH. See how many gates you can get while battling relativity in your car.

Sadly, I don't have a WebGL version at the moment, because the builder won't recognize a line in the OpenRelativity shader code. Hopefully I can fix that issue.

Credits:

A friend showed me this: 

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=uu7jA8EHi_0
And I thought, it’d be a great drifting game...

So I used the open relativity github code and made a drifting game!

https://github.com/MITGameLab/OpenRelativity

Squealing tires from this, https://opengameart.org/content/car-tire-skid-squealing

Engine loop from this: https://opengameart.org/content/car-engine-loop-96khz-4s

Gate Sound from here: https://opengameart.org/content/bell-arpeggio-24

Music from this: https://opengameart.org/content/wasteland-overdrive
